comment.author: 35444525@N02
comment._content: Actually,the man is chinese.His sisiter is Princess Der Ling.She was the First lady-in-waiting to Empress Dowager Cixi.In George Eastman House,the photo is Der Ling sisters. www.geh.org/ar/chus/china/m197501112684_ful.html

comment.author: 10691168@N07
comment._content:
Rishon lin is correct: the photograph shows Xinling, elder brother of Princess Der Ling, who can be seen in the background with her sister Rong Ling (the future Mme Dan Chaopao).  The setting is the Chinese embassy in Paris, the time around 1900.  I use photos from this set in my biography of Princess Der Ling, "Imperial Masquerade" (Hong Kong University Press 2008)

Grant Hayter-Menzies

comment.author: 44176301@N05
comment._content: lovely! the people blurred in the back really make this photo more amazing.

comment.author: 10691168@N07
comment._content: The people in the background are Rongling, sister of Princess Der Ling, wearing breeches, and Der Ling, wearing hat and dress, with embassy servants.
